usage.example: Nostalgic about childhood and the cherished teddy bear. 🧸👧🌈

objects_emojis.name: Nesting Dolls
objects_emojis.meaning: Nesting dolls, symbolizing Russian culture, matryoshka, and hidden surprises.

usage.example: Exploring Russian culture and the beauty of nesting dolls. 🪆🇷🇺❤️

objects_emojis.name: Framed Picture
objects_emojis.meaning: A framed picture, symbolizing art, photography, and memories.

usage.example: Nostalgically looking at a framed picture and recalling cherished memories. 🖼️📸🌟

objects_emojis.name: Mirror
objects_emojis.meaning: A mirror, symbolizing reflection, self-assessment, and vanity.

usage.example: Checking your appearance in the mirror before heading out. 🪞💁‍♂️💄

objects_emojis.name: Window
objects_emojis.meaning: A window, symbolizing views, opportunities, and a fresh perspective.

usage.example: Admiring scenic views from a window on a relaxing day. 🪟🌄🌿

objects_emojis.name: Shopping Bags
objects_emojis.meaning: Shopping bags, symbolizing retail therapy, purchases, and fashion.

usage.example: Indulging in some retail therapy and coming home with shopping bags. 🛍️👗👠

objects_emojis.name: Shopping Cart
objects_emojis.meaning: A shopping cart, symbolizing grocery shopping, convenience, and selections.

usage.example: Filling up the shopping cart with groceries for the week. 🛒🍞🥦

objects_emojis.name: Wrapped Gift
objects_emojis.meaning: A wrapped gift, symbolizing surprises, presents, and celebrations.

usage.example: Presenting a beautifully wrapped gift as a birthday surprise. 🎁🎉🍰

objects_emojis.name: Balloon
objects_emojis.meaning: A balloon, symbolizing celebrations, parties, and happiness.

usage.example: Decorating a room with colorful balloons for a birthday party. 🎈🎂🎉

objects_emojis.name: Carp Streamer
objects_emojis.meaning: A carp streamer, symbolizing the Children's Day festival in Japan.

usage.example: Celebrating Children's Day with colorful carp streamers. 🎏👶🎉

objects_emojis.name: Ribbon
objects_emojis.meaning: A ribbon, symbolizing decoration, bows, and embellishments.

usage.example: Tying a beautiful ribbon on a gift for an elegant touch. 🎀🎁🌟

objects_emojis.name: Magic Wand
objects_emojis.meaning: A magic wand, symbolizing magic, spells, and enchantment.

usage.example: Performing a captivating magic show with a sparkling wand. 🪄✨🎩

objects_emojis.name: Confetti Ball
objects_emojis.meaning: A confetti ball, symbolizing celebrations, parties, and festivities.

usage.example: Throwing confetti at midnight to welcome the New Year. 🎊🎉🍾

objects_emojis.name: Party Popper
objects_emojis.meaning: A party popper, symbolizing excitement, joy, and festive occasions.

usage.example: Popping party poppers to celebrate a friend's birthday. 🎉🎂🥳

objects_emojis.name: Piñata
objects_emojis.meaning: A piñata, symbolizing fun, surprises, and smashing for treats.

usage.example: Kids taking turns to hit the piñata at the fiesta. 🪅🎈🍬

objects_emojis.name: Japanese Dolls
objects_emojis.meaning: Japanese dolls, symbolizing Hinamatsuri (Doll's Day) in Japan.

usage.example: Displaying Japanese dolls to celebrate Hinamatsuri. 🎎🌸🎌

objects_emojis.name: Kite
objects_emojis.meaning: A kite, symbolizing outdoor fun, flying, and high spirits.

usage.example: Flying kites with friends on a sunny day. 🪭🌞🪁

objects_emojis.name: Red Paper Lantern
objects_emojis.meaning: A red paper lantern, symbolizing festivals, illumination, and good luck.

usage.example: Hanging red lanterns for good luck during Chinese New Year. 🏮🧧🎆

objects_emojis.name: Wind Chime
objects_emojis.meaning: A wind chime, symbolizing calm, relaxation, and gentle sounds.

usage.example: Enjoying the tranquil sound of wind chimes in a Zen garden. 🎐🌿🕊️

objects_emojis.name: Kite
objects_emojis.meaning: A kite, symbolizing outdoor fun, flying, and high spirits.

usage.example: Flying kites with friends on a sunny day. 🪭🌞🪁

objects_emojis.name: Red Envelope
objects_emojis.meaning: A red envelope, symbolizing gift-giving, good fortune, and Chinese New Year.

objects_emojis.meaning: An incoming envelope, symbolizing new messages and correspondence.

objects_emojis.meaning: An e-mail symbol, representing electronic communication and messages.

objects_emojis.name: Inbox Tray
